descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: How might we design user experiences which delight? How do we uncover motives, desires and needs and translate those to effective interactions? We'll explore everything from screen-based experiences to interactions with physical products and environment design in this hands-on studio class. Co-taught by Segal's Design Innovator in Residence, Pam Daniels, and Chicago-based designer & start-up founder Jason George.
